# sse_tenant_controls_profile (Data Source)

Fetches a single Tenant Controls Profile by name.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "sse_tenant_controls_profile" "example" {
  name = "Global Tenant Controls"
}

output "profile_id" {
  value = data.sse_tenant_controls_profile.example.id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the Tenant Controls Profile to fetch.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) The description of the Tenant Controls Profile.
- `id` (Number) The ID of the Tenant Controls Profile.
- `is_default` (Boolean) Whether this is the default profile.
